Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you're pretty good at mining, for a human.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you're pretty good at mining, for a human.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! I've read about this tradition... it's a 'birthday gift', isn't it? Hmm, very interesting...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! I've read about this tradition... it's a 'birthday gift', isn't it? Hmm, very interesting...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! I've read about this tradition... it's a 'birthday gift', isn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! I've read about this tradition... it's a 'birthday gift', isn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: So, is it part of the tradition to give out garbage like this?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So, is it part of the tradition to give out garbage like this?

Entries.DialogueText: I can't see the color green very well.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't see the color green very well.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess it's part of living underground for so long.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess it's part of living underground for so long.

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff*... is this milk? *sip*... hmm... tastes good.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff*... is this milk? *sip*... hmm... tastes good.

Entries.DialogueText: I got all this stuff from the surface. I just take it from your people during the night.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I got all this stuff from the surface. I just take it from your people during the night.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm? What is this concept you call "private property"?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm? What is this concept you call "private property"?

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, 'milk'... *slurp*... How interesting. Remind me, again... where exactly does this juice come from?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, 'milk'... *slurp*... How interesting. Remind me, again... where exactly does this juice come from?

Entries.DialogueText: ...!!! *sploosh*
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...!!! *sploosh*

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... cave carrot stew, cave carrot roast, cave carrot soup and cave carrots au gratin.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... cave carrot stew, cave carrot roast, cave carrot soup and cave carrots au gratin.

Entries.DialogueText: ...And a ramekin of cave carrot brulee to sweeten the night.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...And a ramekin of cave carrot brulee to sweeten the night.

Entries.DialogueText: What?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What?

Entries.DialogueText: If you enter the volcano on Ginger Island, you might encounter others like me. Don't be alarmed! We're peaceful with humans.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you enter the volcano on Ginger Island, you might encounter others like me. Don't be alarmed! We're peaceful with humans.

Entries.DialogueText: You know, you're pretty good at mining, for a human.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, you're pretty good at mining, for a human.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, you caught a Stonefish? I know them very well. We sometimes keep them as pets.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, you caught a Stonefish? I know them very well. We somes keep them as s.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, you caught an Ice Pip? They're energetic little fish, despite the frigid environment they live in. My people avoid the frozen areas, though... too cold!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, you caught an Ice Pip? They're energetic little fish, despite the frigid environment they live in. My people avoid the frozen areas, though... too cold!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, you caught a Lava Eel? Very good! Lava Eel fishing is a big part of our culture. They're considered a delicacy!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, you caught a Lava Eel? Very good! Lava Eel fishing is a big part of our culture. They're considered a delicacy!

Entries.DialogueText: You found the legendary Dwarvish Forge? Incredible... I've never seen it, myself.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You found the legendary Dwarvish Forge? Incredible... I've never seen it, myself.

Entries.DialogueText: The machinery is so old, none of my people understand how it works. But it's definitely Dwarvish technology.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The machinery is so old, none of my people understand how it works. But it's definitely Dwarvish technology.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, wanna buy something?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, wanna buy something?

Entries.DialogueText: Long ago, my people knew the secrets of advanced technology. The archaeological evidence proves that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Long ago, my people knew the secrets of advanced technology. The archaeological evidence proves that.

Entries.DialogueText: But I wonder where it came from? And where did it all go? I guess some questions will never be answered...
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I wonder where it came from? And where did it all go? I guess some questions will never be answered...

Entries.DialogueText: I feel most comfortable underground.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I feel most comfortable underground.

Entries.DialogueText: The deeper underground the better.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The deeper underground the better.

Entries.DialogueText: You've never seen a dwarf before, have you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've never seen a dwarf before, have you?

Entries.DialogueText: The mines can be a treacherous place. Be careful, friend.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The mines can be a treacherous . Be careful, friend.

Entries.DialogueText: It's dangerous in the mines. Why don't you buy a few things from my shop to ensure your safety?
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's dangerous in the mines. Why don't you buy a few things from my shop to ensure your safety?

Entries.DialogueText: One day you'll have to tell me about this beverage you call "milk".
Entries.DisplayPattern: One day you'll have to tell me about this beverage you call "milk".

Entries.DialogueText: You're not a spy sent by the Shadow People, are you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're not a spy sent by the Shadow People, are you?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm keeping my eye on you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm keeping my eye on you.

Entries.DialogueText: Most humans fear the unknown... that's why I've hidden my shop here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Most humans fear the unknown... that's why I've hidden my shop here.

Entries.DialogueText: Your mining skills prove you're trustworthy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Your mining skills prove you're trustworthy.

Entries.DialogueText: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us dwarves live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us dwarves live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.

Entries.DialogueText: A Shadow Person, above ground? This is outrageous!
Entries.DisplayPattern: A Shadow Person, above ground? This is outrageous!

Entries.DialogueText: Your people were responsible for the death of my entire family.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Your people were responsible for the death of my entire family.

Entries.DialogueText: 'Sorry' isn't going to cut it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: 'Sorry' isn't going to cut it.

Entries.DialogueText: Let me at him! He's despicable.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let me at him! He's despicable.

Entries.DialogueText: Very well. I'll stay away from the sewer from now on.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Very well. I'll stay away from the sewer from now on.

Entries.DialogueText: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*
Entries.DisplayPattern: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*

Entries.DialogueText: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.

Entries.DialogueText: I was curious about this human gathering... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was curious about this human gathering...

Entries.DialogueText: Please don't tell anyone. I'm hoping to remain hidden here... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Please don't tell anyone. I'm hoping to remain hidden here...

Entries.DialogueText: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*
Entries.DisplayPattern: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*

Entries.DialogueText: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.

Entries.DialogueText: This place is very strange... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is very strange...

Entries.DialogueText: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*
Entries.DisplayPattern: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*

Entries.DialogueText: Rain... it's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Rain... it's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.

Entries.DisplayPattern: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*

Entries.DisplayPattern: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.

Entries.DisplayPattern: You say it's raining up above?

Entries.DisplayPattern: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.

Entries.DisplayPattern: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*

Entries.DisplayPattern: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.

Entries.DisplayPattern: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*

Entries.DialogueText: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.

Entries.DialogueText: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*
Entries.DisplayPattern: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*

Entries.DialogueText: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.

Entries.DialogueText: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*
Entries.DisplayPattern: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*

Entries.DialogueText: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I really love this stuff. You can find great things in the mines.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I really love this stuff. You can find great things in the mines.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, this reminds me of home.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, this reminds me of home.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... Is this what humans like?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... Is this what humans like?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't care what species you are. This is worthless garbage.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't care what species you are. This is worthless garbage.

Entries.DialogueText: An offering! Thank you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: An offering! Thank you.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, wow! A palace constructed for the sole purpose of entertainment!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, wow! A palace constructed for the sole purpose of entertainment!

Entries.DialogueText: Dwarf seems to be in a deep trance...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Dwarf seems to be in a deep trance...

Entries.DialogueText: I didn't understand a thing, but the flashing lights were mesmerizing!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I didn't understand a thing, but the flashing lights were mesmerizing!
